WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 9775 Anganwadi Helper & Worker Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 15:37 IST
 Women and Child Development
 9,775 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 5,500 to 10,000




FOLLOW

The Women and Child Development Gujarat (WCD Gujarat) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 9775 Anganwadi Helper, Anganwadi Teacher Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th can apply for the WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Gujarat.

WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Anganwadi Helper	4198	12th
Anganwadi Teacher	5577	10th pass

WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 43 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process involves

Merit List.
Interview.

WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 5,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 10,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the WCD Gujarat Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.  

Important Dates:

Starting date	08-08-2025
Closing date	30-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
